name: Reaction Time (Rasta)
description: Reaction Time is a silicone digital timepiece that is as bold in color as it is in style. they are waterproof, easy to wear, and look great alone or grouped together. The watch is the perfect accessory to add a streak of color while surfing, skating, doing yoga, or galavanting around town.  It has a digital face, silicone rubber strap, water resistant to 99 feet, and weighs 10 grams. Size small will fit most women and children (6inches/160mm). Medium will fit most men and some women (7inches/180mm). Large will fit some men (8inches/200mm).
